title: Question/s about new Kai'sa skin
body:
I would like to ask a member of RIOT questions about the Prestigious Kai'sa Skin. (These questions are directed to the people who made the skin)
Is It only obtainable with world tokens?
After worlds, can i obtain it through Hextech/ Gemstone Crafting?
After worlds, will it go into the vault?
Is there an idea about when it might come back?
